title: Argon2 Password Hashing Service
description:
Implement Secure Password Management System

Build a comprehensive password security system using Argon2 hashing algorithm with validation rules and strength requirements.

Requirements:
- Integrate Argon2id hashing library for password storage
- Configure Argon2 parameters (memory cost, time cost, parallelism) following OWASP recommendations
- Implement password validation rules:
  * Minimum length requirement (at least 8 characters recommended)
  * Complexity requirements (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)
  * Check against common password lists/dictionaries
  * Prevent password reuse (compare against user's password history)
- Add password strength indicator for user feedback
- Ensure passwords are hashed before storage, never stored in plain text
- Implement secure password comparison during authentication
- Handle hash generation errors gracefully
- Add rate limiting for password verification attempts to prevent brute force attacks
- Include unit tests for all validation rules and hashing functions
- Document password policy for users and developers

Edge cases to consider:
- Unicode characters in passwords
- Maximum password length to prevent DoS attacks
- Migration path for existing passwords if upgrading from different hashing algorithm
- Password reset flow security
